CODE COMPARATIVE TABLE - ORDINANCES
This table gives the location within this Code of those ordinances adopted since the 1979 Code, as updated through November 16, 1999, which are included herein. Ordinances adopted prior to such date were incorporated into the 1979 Code, as supplemented. This table contains some ordinances which precede November 16, 1999, but which were never included in the 1979 Code, as supplemented, for various reasons. Ordinances adopted since November 16, 1999, and not listed herein have been omitted as repealed, superseded or not of a general and permanent nature.
EXPAND
Ordinance
Number  Date Section  Section
this Code
